name: Vu Trung Kien
title: Data Analyst | Reporting Specialist
about: Experienced in data analysis, report automation, and ETL system building in finance, banking & debt management. Strong skills in SQL, Python, Power BI, large-scale data processing optimization. Passionate about transforming data into valuable insights and boosting business efficiency.

projects.name: ETL Pipeline for Uber Data Analysis
projects.description: Designed ETL pipeline using Mage & BigQuery to process 100,000+ Uber records and build a Looker dashboard for demand forecasting by region.

projects.name: Debt Management Dashboard
projects.description: Built Power BI dashboard for debt collection management, integrated multi-source data, real-time KPI tracking.
projects.impact: Optimized contract allocation, increased collection rate by 15%

projects.name: Automated Payment Reconciliation
projects.description: Automated reconciliation of bank payment data with Python & SQL.

description: Managed monthly case allocation for 10+ collection teams across multiple channels, ensuring fairness and transparency in distributing over 3,500,000 contracts.
Developed and maintained centralized Datamart (PostgreSQL), building summary tables to support operational reporting and performance tracking.
Automated recovery reports using Excel, integrating MIS, payment, and follow-up data, reducing manual processing time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.
Designed SQL queries to track performance metrics by teamlead, region, last payment group, and segment.
Led weekly data quality audits, reducing allocation logic errors to below 2%.
Built PostgreSQL procedures for monitoring new phone number quality.
Collaborated with accounting to reconcile MIS and payment data, achieving over 99% accuracy in monthly financial reports.
Designed and implemented data collection pipelines using Python and SQL, automating extraction from multi-source systems.
Developed Python scripts to automate financial data extraction from bank statements.
Built and optimized SQL allocation models, increasing debt recovery rates by 15%.
Created interactive Power BI dashboards to analyze recovery rate trends.
Optimized SQL database schemas to improve scalability.
Streamlined daily workflows by developing Python automation scripts.
Developed a KPI monitoring system in Jira, achieving 80% on-time delivery of key deliverables.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to reconcile financial data, ensuring 99% accuracy in payment records.
Developed 10+ BI and daily collection reports for 10 partners.
Standardized master data codes across 5+ systems and managed large databases.
Supported retrieving customer and debt profiles using SQL queries.
Performed fee reconciliation and updated payment data using Python, Excel, SQL scripts, and SSIS.
Automated monthly reporting and data processing workflows using SSIS and Python.

testimonials.name: Nguyen Van A
testimonials.role: Team Leader at Galaxy Debt Trading
testimonials.feedback: Kien is a highly skilled data analyst with a strong sense of responsibility. He always delivers insightful analysis and automates complex workflows efficiently.

testimonials.name: Tran Thi B
testimonials.feedback: I was impressed by Kien's ability to optimize data pipelines and create impactful dashboards. He is a great team player and problem solver.
